    • addTopping

      public void addTopping(FoodItem item)
      Adding a topping to the pizza. It will instantiate the array toppings if it was not before. Otherwise, it will simple add a new instance into the array.
      Parameters:
      item - -> an object/instance of class FoodItem

    • deliveryCost

      public double deliveryCost()
      This method calculates the delivery cost according to the size in inches of the pizza.
      Specified by:
      deliveryCost in interface pizza.services.Deliverable
      Returns:
      price -> the cost of the delivery

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates price of the pizza with the selected toppings.
      Returns:
      [this.basePrice + toppingsPrice].

    • totalPrice

      public double totalPrice()
      Calculates price of the pizza with the selected toppings.
      Returns:
      [this.basePrice + toppingsPrice + price].
